int32_t FileInput::ReadBlob ( std::ifstream &  instr,
const void *&  value 
) [static]

Reads a blob from a file (as is; no htonl). It is the responsibility of the caller to convert elements of the blob to system types.

Parameters:
instr The input file stream.
value A returned pointer to the blob. The caller must delete[] the returned pointer.
Returns:
The size of the blob read from the file.
